original_title: Travellers Consultancy Solutions bags Service Excellence Award
original_body_lines: Travellers Consultancy Solutions, a leading provider of visa for students planning to study abroad, reaffirms its excellence by winning the Service Excellence Award at the Business World International Awards organized by Business World International (BWIO). Mohamed Infaaz Iqbal, the Chairman and the Managing Director of Travellers Consultancy Solutions received the award at a gala event held at the Taj Samudra Hotel, Colombo. BWIO is an USA based organization, driven with the objective of recognizing the accomplishments and expertise of the global business spectrum. The BWIO Awards recognized and celebrate excellence in business and inspires entrepreneurs to accomplish greater challenges and benchmark their best practices.
